actions.name: Coil Up

cost.trigger: At the start of combat or when the user is switched in.

actions.description:
Trigger: At the start of combat or when the user is switched in.

Effect: Connection - Coil. The user's Coil gains [Priority 3] until the start of their next Activation, and the user freely uses Coil.
